recipes.title: Ture's Red lentil soup
recipes.summary: A creamy and smooth vegetable soup with a tangy twist
instructions: Pre-soak the red lentils if necessary based on packaging recommendation
Peel and chop up carrots into equal size pieces roughly same height as width.
Rougly chop the garlic, onion, and red chili.
Heat up a pot with the cooking oil.
Lightly toast the carrots, garlic, onion, and chili in the pot on medium heat (~5 minutes).
Pour in the water, stock cube, and lentils and bring to a boil.
If you want the parsley in the soup instead of using it for garnish, this is the time to add it.
Let cook for 15 minnutes.
Blend with a hand mixer or food processor until smooth.
Adjust texture with additional water if desired.
Salt and Pepper to taste
(optional) Crumble the white cheese on top of plate when serving along with the parsley.

recipes.title: Classic Pasta e Fagioli
recipes.summary: Traditional Italian bean and pasta soup, hearty and comforting
instructions: Soak white beans overnight or use quick-soak method.
Dice onion, carrots, and celery finely.
Heat olive oil in large pot and sauté vegetables until softened (8-10 minutes).
Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add drained beans, tomatoes, stock, oregano, and bay leaves.
Bring to boil, then simmer for 30 minutes until beans are tender.
Add pasta and cook until al dente.
Remove bay leaves, season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.

recipes.title: Chickpea Curry
recipes.summary: Creamy and aromatic chickpea curry with coconut milk
instructions: Soak and cook chickpeas until tender (or use canned).
Dice onion, mince garlic and ginger.
Heat oil in pan, sauté onion until golden.
Add garlic, ginger, curry powder, and cumin. Cook for 1 minute.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and coconut milk, simmer for 15 minutes.
Season with salt to taste.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice.
recipes.notes: Cilantro: Can substitute with parsley if unavailable

recipes.title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
recipes.summary: Simple Italian pasta with garlic and oil
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Meanwhile, thinly slice garlic cloves.
Heat olive oil in large pan over medium-low heat.
Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook until garlic is golden.
Reserve 240 ml pasta water, then drain pasta.
Add pasta to garlic oil, toss with some pasta water.
Add parsley, season with salt.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Black Bean Soup
recipes.summary: Rich and hearty Latin-inspired black bean soup
instructions: Soak black beans overnight, then drain.
Dice onions, carrots, and celery.
Heat oil in large pot, sauté vegetables for 8 minutes.
Add minced garlic, cumin, and paprika. Cook 1 minute.
Add beans, stock, and bay leaves.
Bring to boil, then simmer 40 minutes until beans are tender.
Remove bay leaves, partially blend for creamy texture.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.title: Rice and Lentils (Mujadara)
recipes.summary: Middle Eastern comfort food with caramelized onions
instructions: Rinse lentils and rice separately.
Thinly slice onions.
Heat oil in pan, fry onions until deeply caramelized (20-25 minutes).
Remove half the onions and set aside for topping.
Add lentils, cumin, and water to pot. Simmer 20 minutes.
Add rice and salt, cook until rice is tender (15-20 minutes).
Season with pepper.
Top with reserved caramelized onions.

recipes.title: Pasta with Tomato Sauce
recipes.summary: Classic Italian tomato sauce with pasta
instructions: Dice onion and mince garlic.
Heat olive oil in large pan, sauté onion until soft.
Add garlic, cook for 1 minute.
Add crushed tomatoes, basil, oregano, and sugar.
Simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, cook pasta according to package directions.
Season sauce with salt and pepper.
Toss pasta with sauce and serve.

recipes.title: Split Pea Soup
recipes.summary: Thick and comforting split pea soup
instructions: Rinse split peas and remove any debris.
Dice carrots, celery, and onion.
Heat oil in large pot, sauté vegetables for 8 minutes.
Add minced garlic, cook for 1 minute.
Add split peas, stock, bay leaves, and thyme.
Bring to boil, then simmer for 45-50 minutes until peas break down.
Remove bay leaves.
Season with salt and pepper, serve hot.

recipes.title: Fried Rice
recipes.summary: Quick and versatile fried rice with vegetables
instructions: Use day-old refrigerated rice for best results.
Beat eggs with pinch of salt.
Heat wok or large pan with oil over high heat.
Scramble eggs, remove and set aside.
Add more oil, stir-fry minced garlic for 30 seconds.
Add frozen vegetables, stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Add rice, break up clumps, stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce, sesame oil, and eggs.
Stir in chopped green onions, season with pepper.

recipes.title: Pasta e Ceci (Pasta and Chickpeas)
instructions: Soak and cook chickpeas until tender.
Heat olive oil, sauté minced garlic and rosemary.
Add tomatoes, cook for 5 minutes.
Add chickpeas and stock, simmer 15 minutes.
Mash some chickpeas for creaminess.
Add pasta, cook until tender.
Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.
Drizzle with olive oil before serving.

recipes.title: Baked Beans
recipes.summary: Sweet and savory homemade baked beans
instructions: Soak white beans overnight, then drain.
Preheat oven to 160°C (320°F).
Dice onion finely.
In oven-safe pot, combine beans, onion, tomato paste, molasses, sugar, mustard, vinegar, and stock.
Cover and bake for 75 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add water if beans become too dry.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot or cold.
recipes.notes: Molasses: Use dark syrup (mörk sirap) or honey as substitute

recipes.title: Lentil Bolognese
instructions: Rinse lentils and cook until tender, drain.
Finely dice carrots, celery, and onion.
Heat oil in large pan, sauté vegetables for 10 minutes.
Add minced garlic, cook 1 minute.
Add tomato paste, cook for 2 minutes.
Add crushed tomatoes, oregano, and basil.
Add cooked lentils, simmer for 20 minutes.
Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
Season sauce with salt and pepper.
Serve sauce over pasta.

recipes.title: Rice Pilaf
recipes.summary: Fluffy and flavorful rice side dish
instructions: Rinse rice until water runs clear.
Dice onion and mince garlic.
Melt butter in pot, sauté onion until translucent.
Add garlic, cook for 1 minute.
Add rice, stir to coat with butter for 2 minutes.
Add stock, bay leaf, thyme, and salt.
Bring to boil, cover, reduce to low heat.
Cook for 18 minutes without lifting lid.
Remove from heat, let rest 5 minutes.
Fluff with fork, remove bay leaf, season with pepper.

recipes.title: Minestrone Soup
recipes.summary: Italian vegetable soup with beans and pasta
instructions: Soak and cook white beans until tender.
Dice all vegetables into small pieces.
Heat oil in large pot, sauté onion, carrots, and celery for 8 minutes.
Add garlic, cook 1 minute.
Add tomatoes, stock, beans, basil, and oregano.
Bring to boil, simmer for 20 minutes.
Add zucchini and pasta, cook until pasta is tender.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with crusty bread.

recipes.title: Red Beans and Rice
instructions: Soak red beans overnight, then drain.
Dice onion, bell pepper, and celery.
Heat oil in large pot, sauté vegetables for 10 minutes.
Add minced garlic, thyme, paprika, and cayenne. Cook 1 minute.
Add beans, stock, and bay leaves.
Bring to boil, then simmer for 45-50 minutes until beans are creamy.
Mash some beans against pot for thickness.
Meanwhile, cook rice separately.
Remove bay leaves, season with salt and pepper.
Serve beans over rice.

recipes.title: Mac and Cheese
recipes.summary: Creamy and comforting macaroni and cheese
instructions: Cook macaroni according to package directions, drain.
In same pot, melt butter over medium heat.
Whisk in flour, cook for 1 minute.
Gradually whisk in milk, cook until thickened.
Add shredded cheese and mustard powder, stir until melted.
Add cooked macaroni, stir to combine.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.
recipes.notes: Cheddar cheese: Can substitute with aged Gouda, Västerbotten, or Präst cheese

recipes.title: Daal (Indian Lentil Stew)
recipes.summary: Warming Indian lentil stew with aromatic spices
instructions: Rinse lentils until water runs clear.
Dice onion, mince garlic and ginger.
Heat oil in pot, add cumin seeds until they sizzle.
Add onion, cook until golden.
Add garlic, ginger, turmeric, and curry powder. Cook 1 minute.
Add lentils, tomatoes, and water.
Bring to boil, then simmer for 25 minutes until lentils are soft.
Stir occasionally, add water if too thick.
Season with salt.
Garnish with cilantro, serve with rice.
recipes.notes: Cilantro: Can substitute with parsley if unavailable

recipes.title: Spanish Rice
instructions: Rinse rice until water runs clear.
Dice onion and bell pepper.
Heat oil in large pan, sauté vegetables for 5 minutes.
Add minced garlic, cumin, and paprika. Cook 1 minute.
Add rice, stir to toast for 2 minutes.
Add tomatoes, tomato paste, stock, and salt.
Bring to boil, cover, reduce heat to low.
Cook for 20 minutes without lifting lid.
Remove from heat, let rest 5 minutes.
Fluff with fork and serve.

recipes.title: Chickpea Salad
instructions: Drain and rinse chickpeas.
Dice cucumber and halve cherry tomatoes.
Thinly slice red onion.
In large bowl, combine chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, and onion.
In small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, and oregano.
Pour dressing over salad, toss to combine.
Season with salt and pepper.
Chill for 10 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Pasta Carbonara
recipes.summary: Classic Roman pasta with egg and cheese sauce
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Cut bacon into small pieces.
In pan, cook bacon until crispy, remove excess fat.
Add minced garlic to pan, cook 30 seconds.
In bowl, whisk eggs with grated parmesan and black pepper.
Reserve 240 ml pasta water, drain pasta.
Add hot pasta to bacon pan off heat.
Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water to create creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and pepper.

recipes.title: White Bean Stew
instructions: Soak white beans overnight, drain.
Dice carrots, celery, and onions.
Heat oil in large pot, sauté vegetables for 10 minutes.
Add minced garlic and rosemary, cook 1 minute.
Add beans, tomatoes, stock, and bay leaves.
Bring to boil, then simmer for 40 minutes until beans are tender.
Remove bay leaves.
Partially mash beans for creamier texture.
Season with salt and pepper.
Drizzle with olive oil before serving.

recipes.title: Pinto Bean Chili
instructions: Soak pinto beans overnight, cook until tender.
Dice onions and bell peppers.
Heat oil in large pot, sauté vegetables for 8 minutes.
Add minced garlic, chili powder, cumin, and paprika. Cook 1 minute.
Add beans, tomatoes, and stock.
Bring to boil, then simmer for 30 minutes.
Stir occasionally, add water if too thick.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with cornbread or rice.

recipes.title: Risotto
instructions: Heat stock in separate pot and keep warm.
Finely dice onion and mince garlic.
Heat oil and half butter in large pan, sauté onion until soft.
Add garlic, cook 1 minute.
Add rice, stir to coat, toast for 2 minutes.
Add wine, stir until absorbed.
Add stock one ladle at a time, stirring constantly.
Wait for liquid to absorb before adding more stock.
Continue for 20 minutes until rice is creamy but al dente.
Remove from heat, stir in remaining butter and parmesan.
Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately.

recipes.title: Pasta Puttanesca
recipes.summary: Bold and briny Italian pasta sauce
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
Slice olives and chop anchovies.
Heat olive oil in pan, sauté minced garlic and anchovies.
Add red pepper flakes, cook 1 minute.
Add tomatoes, olives, capers, and oregano.
Simmer for 15 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Toss with drained pasta and serve.

recipes.title: Lentil Soup
instructions: Rinse lentils and remove debris.
Dice carrots, celery, and onion.
Heat oil in large pot, sauté vegetables for 8 minutes.
Add minced garlic and thyme, cook 1 minute.
Add lentils, tomatoes, stock, and bay leaves.
Bring to boil, then simmer for 30 minutes.
Remove bay leaves.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with crusty bread.

recipes.title: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
In last 3 minutes of cooking, add frozen vegetables.
Drain pasta and vegetables, reserve 240 ml pasta water.
In same pot, heat olive oil and sauté minced garlic.
Add pasta, vegetables, lemon juice, and basil.
Toss with pasta water to create light sauce.
Add grated parmesan.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Bean and Rice Burrito Bowl
recipes.summary: Tex-Mex inspired rice and bean bowl
instructions: Cook rice according to package directions.
Drain and rinse black beans if canned.
Dice onion and mince garlic.
Heat oil in pan, sauté onion for 5 minutes.
Add garlic, cumin, and chili powder. Cook 1 minute.
Add beans and tomatoes, simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir lime juice into cooked rice.
Season beans with salt.
Serve beans over rice, garnish with cilantro.
recipes.notes: Cilantro: Can substitute with parsley if unavailable

recipes.title: Couscous with Vegetables
instructions: Dice onion and apricots.
Heat oil in pan, sauté onion for 5 minutes.
Add minced garlic, cumin, and cinnamon. Cook 1 minute.
Add chickpeas and apricots, cook for 5 minutes.
Bring stock to boil in separate pot.
Pour stock over couscous in bowl, cover for 5 minutes.
Fluff couscous with fork.
Mix chickpea mixture with couscous.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Pasta with White Beans
recipes.summary: Quick pasta with beans and greens
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Drain and rinse white beans.
Halve cherry tomatoes.
Heat olive oil in large pan, sauté sliced garlic until golden.
Add red pepper flakes and tomatoes, cook 5 minutes.
Add white beans and basil, cook 5 minutes.
Add spinach, cook until wilted.
Add drained pasta and pasta water to create sauce.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with olive oil drizzle.

recipes.title: Vegetable Barley Soup
instructions: Rinse barley.
Dice carrots, celery, and onion.
Heat oil in large pot, sauté vegetables for 8 minutes.
Add minced garlic and thyme, cook 1 minute.
Add barley, tomatoes, stock, and bay leaves.
Bring to boil, then simmer for 40 minutes.
Remove bay leaves.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Lemon Orzo
instructions: In pot, melt butter and sauté minced garlic for 1 minute.
Add orzo, toast for 2 minutes.
Add stock, bring to boil.
Simmer uncovered for 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat when orzo is creamy.
Stir in lemon juice, zest, and parmesan.
Add parsley.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Refried Beans
instructions: Soak and cook pinto beans until very tender.
Drain beans, reserve cooking liquid.
Dice onion and mince garlic.
Heat oil in large pan, sauté onion until golden.
Add garlic and cumin, cook 1 minute.
Add beans, mash with potato masher.
Add reserved cooking liquid to reach desired consistency.
Cook for 10 minutes, stirring constantly.
Season with salt.
Serve as side dish or in tacos.

recipes.title: Ramen Noodle Soup
instructions: Bring stock to boil in pot.
Add minced garlic and ginger.
Add soy sauce and sesame oil.
Add ramen noodles, cook according to package time.
Add dried seaweed in last minute.
Season with white pepper.
Garnish with sliced green onions.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Pasta Fagioli (Simplified)
recipes.summary: Quick version of Italian bean and pasta soup
instructions: Dice onion and mince garlic.
Heat oil in pot, sauté onion for 5 minutes.
Add garlic and basil, cook 1 minute.
Add tomatoes, beans, and stock.
Bring to boil, add pasta.
Simmer until pasta is cooked.
Partially mash some beans for thickness.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with crusty bread.

recipes.title: Coconut Rice
instructions: Rinse rice until water runs clear.
In pot, combine rice, coconut milk, water, sugar, and salt.
Bring to boil, stir once.
Cover, reduce heat to lowest setting.
Cook for 15 minutes without lifting lid.
Remove from heat, let rest 5 minutes.
Fluff with fork and serve.

recipes.title: Pasta Arrabbiata
recipes.summary: Spicy Italian tomato sauce with pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Heat olive oil in large pan.
Add sliced garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 minute.
Add crushed tomatoes.
Simmer for 15 minutes.
Add parsley and salt to taste.
Toss with drained pasta.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Hummus Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Reserve 240 ml pasta water.
In large bowl, mix hummus, lemon juice, minced garlic, olive oil, and basil.
Add hot pasta to hummus mixture.
Add pasta water gradually to create creamy sauce.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Tomato Rice
recipes.summary: Flavorful rice cooked in tomato sauce
instructions: Rinse rice until water runs clear.
Dice onion and mince garlic.
Heat oil in pot, sauté onion for 5 minutes.
Add garlic and basil, cook 1 minute.
Add rice, stir to coat for 2 minutes.
Add tomatoes, tomato paste, stock, and salt.
Bring to boil, cover, reduce heat to low.
Cook for 18 minutes without lifting lid.
Remove from heat, let rest 5 minutes.
Fluff with fork, season with pepper.

recipes.title: Chickpea Pasta
recipes.summary: Simple pasta with chickpeas and garlic
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Drain and rinse chickpeas.
Heat olive oil in large pan.
Add sliced garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 2 minutes.
Add chickpeas and oregano, cook 5 minutes.
Lightly mash some chickpeas.
Add drained pasta and lemon juice.
Toss with pasta water to create sauce.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Quinoa Pilaf
instructions: Rinse quinoa thoroughly.
Dice onion and carrots finely.
Heat oil in pot, sauté vegetables for 5 minutes.
Add minced garlic and thyme, cook 1 minute.
Add quinoa, toast for 2 minutes.
Add stock and salt, bring to boil.
Cover, reduce heat to low, cook 15 minutes.
Remove from heat, let rest 5 minutes.
Fluff with fork, season with pepper.

recipes.title: Navy Bean Soup
instructions: Soak white beans overnight, drain.
Dice carrots, celery, and onions.
Heat oil in large pot, sauté vegetables for 10 minutes.
Add minced garlic and thyme, cook 1 minute.
Add beans, stock, and bay leaves.
Bring to boil, then simmer for 50 minutes.
Remove bay leaves.
Partially blend for creamy texture.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Pasta with Lentil Sauce
recipes.summary: Protein-rich pasta with red lentil sauce
instructions: Rinse red lentils.
Dice onion and mince garlic.
Heat oil in pot, sauté onion for 5 minutes.
Add garlic, basil, and oregano, cook 1 minute.
Add lentils and tomatoes.
Simmer for 25 minutes until lentils are soft.
Meanwhile, cook pasta according to package directions.
Season sauce with salt and pepper.
Serve sauce over pasta.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Soak dried mushrooms in warm water for 20 minutes, then chop.
Heat stock and keep warm.
Dice onion and mince garlic.
Heat oil and half butter in pan, sauté onion until soft.
Add garlic and thyme, cook 1 minute.
Add mushrooms, cook 3 minutes.
Add rice, toast for 2 minutes.
Add wine, stir until absorbed.
Add stock one ladle at a time, stirring constantly.
Continue for 20 minutes until rice is creamy.
Stir in remaining butter and parmesan.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Lentil Tacos
instructions: Cook lentils until tender, drain.
Dice onion and mince garlic.
Heat oil in pan, sauté onion for 5 minutes.
Add garlic, chili powder, cumin, and paprika. Cook 1 minute.
Add lentils and tomato paste, stir well.
Add small amount of water if too dry.
Season with salt.
Warm taco shells.
Fill shells with lentil mixture.
Serve with desired toppings.

recipes.title: Congee (Rice Porridge)
instructions: Rinse rice thoroughly.
Slice ginger thinly.
In large pot, combine rice, stock, and ginger.
Bring to boil, then reduce to low simmer.
Cook for 50-60 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Rice should break down into creamy porridge.
Add minced garlic in last 10 minutes.
Season with soy sauce, sesame oil, salt, and pepper.
Garnish with sliced green onions.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Pasta with Garlic and Breadcrumbs
recipes.summary: Simple pasta with crispy garlic breadcrumbs
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
Heat half the oil in pan, toast breadcrumbs until golden.
Remove breadcrumbs and set aside.
Add remaining oil, sauté sliced garlic until golden.
Add red pepper flakes.
Add drained pasta and parsley.
Toss with pasta water.
Season with salt.
Top with toasted breadcrumbs.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Bean Salad
instructions: Drain and rinse all beans.
Dice red onion and bell pepper.
In large bowl, combine beans, onion, and pepper.
In small bowl, whisk oil, vinegar, and oregano.
Pour dressing over bean mixture.
Toss to combine.
Season with salt and pepper.
Chill for at least 30 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Chickpea Stew
instructions: Soak and cook chickpeas until tender.
Dice onions and carrots.
Heat oil in large pot, sauté vegetables for 8 minutes.
Add minced garlic, cumin, and paprika. Cook 1 minute.
Add chickpeas, tomatoes, and stock.
Bring to boil, then simmer for 25 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with crusty bread.

recipes.title: Buttered Noodles
instructions: Cook egg noodles according to package directions.
Drain noodles, return to pot.
Add butter while noodles are hot, stir until melted.
Add parmesan, parsley, and garlic powder.
Toss to combine.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Pasta with Canned Tuna
recipes.summary: Quick pasta with tuna and capers
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Drain tuna.
Heat olive oil in large pan.
Sauté minced garlic and red pepper flakes for 1 minute.
Add tuna and capers, break up tuna.
Add drained pasta, lemon juice, and parsley.
Toss with pasta water to create sauce.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Mushroom Barley Soup
instructions: Soak dried mushrooms in warm water for 20 minutes, chop.
Rinse barley.
Dice carrots, celery, and onion.
Heat oil in pot, sauté vegetables for 8 minutes.
Add minced garlic and thyme, cook 1 minute.
Add mushrooms, barley, stock, and bay leaves.
Bring to boil, then simmer for 45 minutes.
Remove bay leaves.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Peanut Noodles
instructions: Cook noodles according to package directions.
In bowl, whisk peanut butter, soy sauce, vinegar, and sesame oil.
Add minced garlic and ginger to sauce.
Add warm water to thin sauce if needed.
Drain noodles, reserve some cooking water.
Toss noodles with sauce, adding pasta water as needed.
Garnish with sliced green onions.
Add red pepper flakes to taste.
Serve warm or cold.

recipes.title: White Bean Mash
recipes.summary: Creamy mashed white beans as a side
instructions: Drain and rinse white beans.
In pot, heat olive oil and sauté minced garlic for 1 minute.
Add beans, stock, and rosemary.
Heat through for 5 minutes.
Mash beans with potato masher to desired consistency.
Add lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve as side dish.

recipes.title: Tomato Lentil Soup
instructions: Rinse red lentils.
Dice onion and carrots.
Heat oil in pot, sauté vegetables for 8 minutes.
Add minced garlic, cumin, and paprika. Cook 1 minute.
Add lentils, tomatoes, and stock.
Bring to boil, then simmer for 25 minutes.
Blend partially for creamy texture if desired.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Rice and Bean Casserole
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Dice onion and bell peppers.
Heat oil in pan, sauté vegetables for 5 minutes.
Add minced garlic, cumin, and chili powder. Cook 1 minute.
In casserole dish, combine rice, beans, tomatoes, sautéed vegetables, stock, and salt.
Cover tightly with foil.
Bake for 35 minutes until rice is tender.
Uncover, top with shredded cheese.
Bake 5 more minutes until cheese melts.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Oatmeal with Dried Fruit
recipes.summary: Warm breakfast oatmeal with dried fruits
instructions: Chop dried apricots into small pieces.
In pot, bring water to boil.
Add oats, raisins, apricots, cinnamon, and salt.
Reduce heat to medium, stir occasionally.
Cook for 5-7 minutes until thick and creamy.
Stir in brown sugar.
Serve hot.

recipes.title: Pasta with Anchovies
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
In separate pan, toast breadcrumbs in a bit of oil, set aside.
Heat olive oil in large pan.
Add anchovy fillets and sliced garlic.
Cook until anchovies dissolve into oil.
Add red pepper flakes.
Add drained pasta and parsley.
Toss with pasta water.
Top with toasted breadcrumbs.
Season with black pepper.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Red Lentil Daal
instructions: Rinse red lentils until water runs clear.
Dice onion, mince garlic and ginger.
Heat oil in pot, add cumin seeds until they sizzle.
Add onion, cook until golden.
Add garlic, ginger, turmeric, and garam masala. Cook 1 minute.
Add lentils, tomatoes, and water.
Bring to boil, then simmer for 20 minutes.
Stir occasionally, lentils should be very soft.
Season with salt.
Garnish with cilantro.
Serve with rice or flatbread.
recipes.notes: Garam masala: Available in well-stocked supermarkets or Asian specialty stores. Cilantro: Can substitute with parsley if unavailable

recipes.title: Barley Risotto
instructions: Heat stock and keep warm.
Dice onion and mince garlic.
Heat oil and half butter in pan, sauté onion until soft.
Add garlic, cook 1 minute.
Add barley, toast for 2 minutes.
Add wine, stir until absorbed.
Add stock one ladle at a time, stirring frequently.
Wait for liquid to absorb before adding more.
Continue for 30-35 minutes until barley is tender.
Stir in remaining butter and parmesan.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Vegetable Fried Quinoa
instructions: Use cold cooked quinoa for best results.
Beat eggs with pinch of salt.
Heat wok with oil over high heat.
Scramble eggs, remove and set aside.
Add more oil, stir-fry minced garlic for 30 seconds.
Add frozen vegetables, stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Add quinoa, break up clumps, stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce, sesame oil, and eggs.
Stir in chopped green onions.
Serve hot.
